steps.title: Prepare Ingredients
instructions: Cook the bacon until crispy and set aside on paper towels to drain.
Thinly slice the turkey breast, avocado, lettuce, and tomato.

steps.title: Toast the Bread
instructions: Toast three slices of bread until golden and crispy.

steps.title: Assemble the Sandwich
instructions: Spread mayonnaise on one side of each toasted bread slice.
Layer the first slice with lettuce, turkey, and tomato. Add a second slice of bread on top.
On the second layer of bread, add bacon, avocado, and another layer of lettuce.
Top with the final slice of bread, mayonnaise side down. Secure the sandwich with toothpicks if desired.
Cut the sandwich into quarters, diagonally, creating classic club sandwich triangles.
